content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Smelting Area (around Position(0,0))
Consists of multiple furnaces:
- Stone furnace at Position(0,0)
- Stone furnace at Position(2,0) 
- Stone furnace at Position(4,4) containing 2 iron plates and 1 coal
- Stone furnace at Position(6,4)

###Inserter Assembly Line (around Position(23.5, 2.5))
Consists of:
- Assembling machine 1 at Position(23.5, 2.5) configured to craft inserters
- Two burner inserters:
  - One at Position(21.5, 2.5) facing left with 5 coal as fuel
  - One at Position(25.5, 2.5) facing left with 5 coal as fuel
- Two wooden chests:
  - Input chest at Position(20.5, 2.5) containing 235 inserters
  - Output chest at Position(26.5, 2.5)

###Power Generation System (around Position(-2.5, 24))
Consists of:
- Boiler at Position(-2.5, 24.0)
- Steam engine at Position(4.5, 24.5)
- Offshore pump at Position(-9.5, 24.5)
- Connected pipe network carrying water and steam
- Electric pole network connecting power to other structures

###Research Lab Network
Multiple labs spread across the map:
- Several labs with automation science packs (17, 68, 40 packs)
- Some labs with logistic science packs (2 packs)
- Multiple unpowered labs

ERROR TIPS

### Power Connection Issues
- Ensure all machines requiring electricity are properly connected to the power network through electric poles
- Check that the steam engine is running and producing enough power

### Resource Management Issues
- Keep track of coal levels in boiler and burner inserters to prevent fuel shortages
- Ensure sufficient iron plates are available before attempting to craft components

### Assembly Line Issues
- Verify all required ingredients are available before starting assembly machine recipes
- Make sure the input/output inserters have proper fuel and are correctly oriented

### Recipe Requirements
- Remember that iron plates and gear wheels require furnace smelting or machine assembly - they cannot be hand crafted
- Plan the production chain to ensure all intermediate products are available before attempting to craft final products

### Fluid System Issues
- Maintain proper pipe connections between boiler, steam engine and pumps
- Monitor water and steam levels to ensure continuous power generation
